Class CwAnimation.CustomAnimation

java.lang.Object

      com.nanosim.client.content.other.CwAnimation.CustomAnimation
Enclosing class:
CwAnimation
public class CwAnimation.CustomAnimation
extends com.google.gwt.animation.client.Animation

A custom animation that moves a small image around a circle in an AbsolutePanel.

          The x-coordinate of the center of the circle.
